Span.Tab1: We'll bring over your bookmarks and other info from another browser, so you feel right at home.
Span.Tab2: Microsoft Edge protects you from phishing schemes and malicious software while you're online so you can browse confidently.
Span.Tab3: Personalise Microsoft Edge with popular extensions like Pinterest's Pin It button, Amazon Assistant, AdBlock, Adblock Plus, LastPass and more.
Span.Tab4: Want more tips? Click below to see what's new with Microsoft Edge.

AriaLabel.AriaLabel1: Welcome to Microsoft Edge. Let's get you set up. One. Get your stuff. Two. Surf safely. Three. Customize with extensions.
AriaLabel.AriaLabel2: Get your stuff Illustration. One. Get your stuff. We'll bring over your bookmarks and other info from another browser, so you feel right at home.
AriaLabel.AriaLabel3: Safety shield illustration. Two. Surf safely. Microsoft Edge protects you from phishing schemes and malicious software while you're online so you can browse confidently.
AriaLabel.AriaLabel4: Extensions Illustration. Three. Customize with extensions. Personalize Microsoft Edge with popular extensions like Pinterest's Pin It button, Amazon Assistant, AdBlock, Adblock Plus, LastPass, and more.
AriaLabel.AriaLabel5: You're good to go. Want more tips? Click below to see what's new with Microsoft Edge.
